attributes.action: restart a British owned car industry such as through large cash grants or interest free loans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present in the UK, there are only foreign owned subidaries such as Vauxhall or Land Rover or actual foreign car car plants such as Honda. There are a few specialist car manufacturers such as Morgan still going but not enough to be called a British car industry.  There is nothing to stop a foreign owner closing a car plant down especilly in the UK as public pressure means less.
